summary: Extraterrestrials appear as destructive "electrical tornadoes" on Earth.
cast: Stacey Asaro|Marcus Lyle Brown|Claire Conti|Jeff Fahey|David Jensen|Terry Kiser|Willard E. Pugh|Caleb Tourres|Kari Wuhrer|James Clement|Emily D. Haley|Chip Haw|Mike Kimmel|Daniel Ponsky|Glen Warner
title: Alien tornado
